column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The server was friendly when she was around but she was rarely around.  I tried to get her attention for 15 mins for the check.  First we sat there with the pizza pushed away from us and plates stacked
column2: looking at her standing in the soda station.  She didn't even turn her head our way.  They Seated another person in the section and she went right to them.
